short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight Azure DevOps backlog rows based on specific fields or conditions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Very simple plugin that gives the possibility to add colored badges and colored text to backlog elements that have a tag-like column. 

To apply the badges and colors is necessary to add the tags-like column to the backlog table, then expand it in a way that all the tags are visible. If you are not interested in that columns contents, you can move it to the last position, the column is only needed to read the tags by the extension.
